question: Which Government scheme has recently completed six years since inception?
explanation:
The flagship Government scheme for Financial Inclusion - Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) has completed 6 years.
The scheme was launched in on August 15th 2014, with an aim to bring the unbanked people of the country into the Banking system. As per official reports, till August 2020 40.35 crore bank accounts have been opened under the scheme.
